name: Ezenia!
tag_list: chat, video, im, txt, text, colaboration, secure, security, fips-140-2, 201cmr12, hippa, real-time, communication
overview:
Founded in 1991, Ezenia has evolved as a leading provider of real-time collaboration solutions that bring new and valuable levels of interaction and collaboration to corporate networks and the Internet. The Ezenia team is driven by the rewards that come from innovation: new ideas, new inventions, and new solutions to customer challenges. We are proud and excited to be at the forefront of some of the most sophisticated enterprise collaboration and business intelligence products available today.

We strive to bring companies together in a natural forum: voice-to-voice, face-to-face, in real-time, across popular network standards. Our mission is to provide people with the technology they need to work together regardless of their location, to make them more effective and efficient. Our solutions enable dispersed teams to work together productively, allowing critical information to be disseminated quickly and decisions to be made more rapidly.

Ezenia helps foster communities where people share ideas, exchange views, and discuss topics through voice, video, and data capabilities.
